title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist by pressing CtrlSpace inside a Java file, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes were made.
EB: When using code assist by pressing CtrlSpace inside a Java file, the file should not be marked as dirtied if no changes were made.
SR:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below:
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press CtrlSpace.
